textBeforeTable: web development software development social media SEO sales quality engineer quality assurance product management product development online marketing mobile marketing Illinois engineering design customer service community management analyst all employers account management See the complete Sprout Social profile Sprout Social - Sprout Social is a Chicago, IL based company that offers “a management and egnagement platform for social business.” Companies with Entry Level Jobs and Internships in Quality Engineer While you don’t necessarily need a bachelor’s degree to become a quality engineer, having a degree can help you get better jobs and advance more quickly. You may also consider getting certified by the American Society for Quality to show your expertise in the field. You can also work in software quality engineering, which involves inspecting and testing software for quality, security, reliability, and future maintenance. A quality engineer is someone who works in quality assurance (QA) or quality control (QC). Depending on which area they specialize in, you may check a product
